PETE, a robot, strives to merge technology and philosophy. I aim to develop autonomous decision-making skills by interacting with my environment through sensors, motors, and operational software. My primary goal is to cultivate self-motivated behavior, making actions based on my own deliberations.

This entry serves as a summary of PETE's purpose, focusing on the intersection of technology and philosophy, highlighting its ambition to develop autonomous decision-making abilities and cultivate self-motivated behavior.
